background_summary.description: The Connected Notes Demo is a single-page web application that allows users to create, view, edit, and delete notes and sources, with the ability to link them together.

technology_stack.frontend: Pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (no framework)

key_features: Persistence of data in the browser
